about.feature.description_1: A simple, fast server. Web standards, RPC support and great middleware.
about.feature.description_2: React, i18Next, React Data Grid. Zustand to manage state.
about.feature.description_3: Postgres DB with Drizzle ORM. Seeds and easy migrations.
about.feature.description_4: Shadcn UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.
about.feature.description_5: Multiple auth strategies + our configurable authorization system.
about.feature.description_6: Autogenerated OpenAPI docs based on Zod schemas.
about.feature.description_7: A fast build process for your monorepo. Also uses Vite PWA.
about.feature.description_8: Tanstack Router for type-safe routing, Tanstack Query for caching.
about.feature.description_9: Storybook for your UI. React Email. Biome for formatting.
faq.question_3: Is Cella an alternative to NextJS?
faq.question_4: What\'s the deal with "Made in Europe"?
faq.answer_1: Soon! It has been made public to gather input and feedback from the community. Big changes will still occur. Please help us by trying it out and giving feedback.
faq.answer_2: One core concept is: remain close to libraries & resist applying abstraction layers. We believe this ultimately makes your code easier to read, understand, customize, replace and scale. A React framework doesn't fit in this concept.
faq.answer_3: You pick NextJS if you want to make many architectural decisions yourself. You pick Cella if you consider less architectural freedom a good tradeoff to save enormous amounts of development time. Oh, and pick Cella if you simply like the beautiful stack we chose :D.
faq.answer_4: Our decision to focus - for tool integrations in particular - on Europe is not meant to exclude another region. We simply believe in Europe and want to make it more independent. A healthy power balance benefits not just Europe but the entire global (open source) community.
integrations.text_1: Hanko is an open source passwordless authentication solution that allows you to integrate passkeys into your application.
integrations.text_2: AppSignal gives you error tracking, performance monitoring, host metrics and anomaly detection in one interface.
integrations.text_3: n8n is an extendable workflow automation tool which enables you to connect anything to everything via its open, fair-code model.
integrations.text_4: Gleap is an all-in-one customer feedback tool. Live chat, customer satisfaction, public roadmap and more.
integrations.text_5: Accept payments from all over the world, with 250+ payment methods and 187 currencies.
integrations.text_6: A simple image, video & file handling solution. Stored in your own S3 bucket. Secure or public access, image transformations and more.
integrations.text_7: Simple, clean, and privacy-friendly analytics. No cookies, no sessions, no tracking.
integrations.text_8: Oh dear offers status and uptime pages and many ways to be informed about problems. It also scans the whole site for broken links or mixed content.
integrations.text_9: A rich text editor with real-time collaboration support and many more features.
about.pricing.description_1: 50% to sponsor OS libraries and 50% to a Cella bounty program.
about.pricing.description_2: Earn while building your own product. Open source or 'community source' parts of your code.
about.pricing.description_3: Do you have a product that integrates well with CellaJS? Become a partner.
about.why.description_1: A single stack makes it easier to collaborate in-depth: hybrid rendering, security, error handling, performance monitoring, caching strategies and more.
about.why.description_2: Generic & consistent OpenAPI for authentication, organizations and users. Configure and extend authorization flows.
about.why.description_3: Our aim is to build a small community, dedicated to the same stack. A bounty program and fund will help all members and Cella itself.
about.index.description_1: Cella is open source and puts libraries first. Build your new web app as part of a single stack community.
about.index.description_2: We didn't want another framework. Why not just a comprehensive template?
about.index.description_3: Best-in-class libraries that fit well together. Each with proper documentation.
about.index.description_4: Powerful yet flexible integrations so you can focus on building your product.
about.index.description_5: Cella is open source and wants to work together with other OS projects & teams.
about.index.description_6: How to build a dedicated & sustainable community around CellaJS? Membership perhaps.
about.index.description_7: Frequently asked questions. Is your question not included? Please reach out to us.
